characters.name: Jon Snow
titles: Lord Commander of the Night's Watch
characters.roleInStory: Jon Snow, the bastard son of Eddard Stark, plays a crucial role in the north's defense against the White Walkers and eventually is revealed to be Aegon Targaryen, rightful heir to the Iron Throne.
quotes: - 'The night is dark and full of terrors, but the fire burns them all away.'
- 'I'm not a Stark.'

death.details: Stabbed to death by his own men for being a traitor to the Night's Watch, later resurrected by Melisandre.

characters.name: Eddard Stark
characters.roleInStory: Eddard Stark, the honorable lord of Winterfell, serves as the Hand of the King to his old friend, King Robert Baratheon. His quest for truth and justice leads to his downfall.
quotes: - 'Winter is coming.'
- 'I don't fight in tournaments because when I fight a man for real, I don't want him to know what I can do.'

death.details: Executed by beheading on the order of King Joffrey Baratheon.

characters.name: Daenerys Targaryen
titles: Khaleesi of the Great Grass Sea
characters.roleInStory: Daenerys Targaryen, the last surviving member of House Targaryen, seeks to reclaim the Iron Throne and free the people of Slaver's Bay.
quotes: - 'I will take what is mine with fire and blood.'
- 'I am the blood of the dragon.'

death.details: Stabbed to death by Jon Snow after destroying King's Landing.

characters.name: Cersei Lannister
characters.roleInStory: Cersei Lannister, the cunning and ruthless queen regent, seeks to maintain power for herself and her family at any cost.
quotes: - 'When you play the game of thrones, you win or you die.'
- 'The more people you love, the weaker you are.'

death.details: Crushed by falling debris during the destruction of King's Landing.

characters.name: Tyrion Lannister
characters.roleInStory: Tyrion Lannister, the clever and witty dwarf, seeks to prove his worth and find his place in a world that often underestimates him.
quotes: - 'I drink and I know things.'
- 'I have a tender spot in my heart for cripples, bastards, and broken things.'

characters.name: Arya Stark
characters.roleInStory: Arya Stark, the youngest daughter of Eddard Stark, is known for her fierce spirit and skills in combat. After escaping the capital, she embarks on a journey of survival and revenge, eventually becoming a skilled assassin.
quotes: - 'A girl has no name.'
- 'I can't sleep until I say the names of the ones I'm going to kill.'

characters.name: Sansa Stark
characters.roleInStory: Sansa Stark, the eldest daughter of Eddard Stark, begins as a naive and innocent
quotes: - 'I am Sansa Stark of Winterfell. This is my home. And you can't frighten me.'
- 'Without Littlefinger and Ramsay and the rest, I would have stayed a little bird all my life.'

characters.name: Bran Stark
characters.roleInStory: Bran Stark, the second son of Eddard Stark, is a warg and greenseer who becomes the Three-Eyed Raven, with the ability to see into the past, present, and future.
quotes: - 'I'm not really Bran Stark anymore. I'm the Three-Eyed Raven.'
- 'The past is already written. The ink is dry.'
placesVisited: The Cave of the Three-Eyed Raven

characters.name: Robb Stark
characters.roleInStory: Robb Stark, the eldest son of Eddard Stark, is declared King in the North and leads a rebellion against the Lannisters.
quotes: - 'I have won every battle. Yet I'm losing this war.'
- 'If we do it your way Kingslayer, you'd win. We're not doing it your way.'

death.details: Killed at the Red Wedding by Roose Bolton and Walder Frey.

characters.name: Jaime Lannister
characters.roleInStory: Jaime Lannister, the eldest son of Tywin Lannister, is known for his skill in combat and his complicated relationship with his sister, Cersei.
quotes: - 'The things I do for love.'
- 'I never cared much for apologies. No one can undo what's been done.'

characters.name: Catelyn Stark
characters.roleInStory: Catelyn Stark, the wife of Eddard Stark, is a devoted mother and protector of her children.

death.details: Killed at the Red Wedding by Walder Frey.

characters.name: Theon Greyjoy
characters.roleInStory: Theon Greyjoy, the only surviving son of Balon Greyjoy, is taken as a ward by Eddard Stark and struggles with his identity and loyalty.
quotes: - 'My real father lost his head at King's Landing. I made a choice, and I chose wrong.'
- 'I always wanted to do the right thing. Be the right kind of person. But never knew what that meant.'

characters.name: Yara Greyjoy
characters.roleInStory: Yara Greyjoy, the daughter of Balon Greyjoy, is a fierce and skilled warrior who seeks to prove herself as a leader.
quotes: - 'I'm going to find my little brother, and I'm going to bring him home.'
- 'I want to build a world where people don't have to be afraid.'

characters.name: Jorah Mormont
characters.roleInStory: Jorah Mormont, the exiled knight, serves as an advisor and protector to Daenerys Targaryen.
quotes: - 'There's a beast in every man, and it stirs when you put a sword in his hand.'
- 'Khaleesi, you have a gentle heart, but this is how it's always been. I've seen it with my own eyes.'

characters.name: Brienne of Tarth
characters.roleInStory: Brienne of Tarth, the skilled warrior, is known for her loyalty and honor. She serves as a protector to the Stark children.
quotes: - 'Should I Fail To Persuade The Blackfish To Surrender And If You Attack The Castle, Honor Compels Me To Fight For Sansa's Kin...To Fight You. Let's Hope It Doesn't Come To That.'
- 'I'm no lady.'

characters.name: Petyr Baelish
characters.roleInStory: Petyr Baelish, the cunning and manipulative lord, seeks to gain power and influence through political maneuvering.
quotes: - 'Chaos isn't a pit. Chaos is a ladder.'
- 'I did warn you not to trust me.
- 'So Many Men, They Risk So Little. They Spend Their Lives Avoiding Danger. And Then They Die. I would Risk Everything To Get What I Want.'

death.details: Executed by Sansa Stark for his crimes.

characters.name: Sandor Clegane
characters.roleInStory: Sandor Clegane, the fearsome warrior, is known for his brutal nature and his complicated relationship with his brother, Gregor Clegane.
quotes: - 'You know nothing, Jon Snow'
- 'Hate's as good a thing as any to keep a person going. Better than most.'

death.details: Died from injuries sustained in a fight with his brother, Gregor Clegane.

characters.name: Samwell Tarly
characters.roleInStory: Samwell Tarly, the timid and bookish member of the Night's Watch. A very self-aware And honest man, seeks to prove himself as a capable and brave warrior.
quotes: - 'Sometimes A Man Has To Make Hard Choices, Choices That Might Look Wrong To Others, But You Know Are Right In The Long Run.'
- 'I Always Wanted To Be A Wizard!'

characters.name: Joffrey Baratheon
characters.roleInStory: Joffrey Baratheon, the cruel and sadistic king, is known for his violent and impulsive nature.
quotes: - 'I'm going to give you a present. After I raise my armies and kill your traitor brother, I'm going to give you his head as well.'
- 'Everyone is mine to torment.'

characters.name: Margaery Tyrell
characters.roleInStory: Margaery Tyrell, the beautiful and cunning queen, seeks to maintain power and influence in the royal court.

death.details: Killed in the destruction of the Great Sept of Baelor.

characters.name: Oberyn Martell
characters.roleInStory: Oberyn Martell, the charismatic and skilled warrior, seeks to avenge his sister's death and protect his family's honor.

death.details: Killed in a trial by combat by Gregor Clegane.

characters.name: Lysa Arryn
characters.roleInStory: Catelyn Stark's younger sister and the widow of Jon Arryn, the Hand of the King. She is known for her overprotective nature and her love for her son, Robin Arryn.
quotes: - 'It's all right. It will be all right. You'll be a widow soon. They'll execute that dwarf for murdering the king, and you'll be free to marry Robin! You'll be the Lady of the Vale. Hmm?'
- 'I lied for you! I killed for you! Why did you bring her here? Why?!'

death.details: Pushed through the Moon Door by Petyr Baelish.

characters.name: Ramsay Bolton
characters.roleInStory: Ramsay Bolton, the sadistic and cruel lord, seeks to maintain power and control through fear and violence.
quotes: - 'If you think this has a happy ending, you haven't been paying attention.'
- 'I am Lord Bolton. I am your Warden. I am the closest thing to a father you have left.'

death.details: Eaten alive by his own hounds.

characters.name: Roose Bolton
characters.roleInStory: Roose Bolton, the cold and calculating lord, seeks to maintain power and control through political maneuvering and manipulation.
quotes: The Lannisters send their regards.

death.details: Stabbed by his own son, Ramsay Bolton.

characters.name: Olenna Tyrell
characters.roleInStory: Olenna Tyrell, the sharp-witted and cunning matriarch, seeks to maintain power and influence through political maneuvering and manipulation.
quotes: - 'I wonder if you're the worst person I've ever met.'

- 'I'd hate to die like your son. Clawing at my neck, foam and bile spilling from my mouth, eyes blood red, skin purple. Must have been horrible for you, as a Kingsguard, as a father. It was horrible enough for me. A shocking scene. Not at all what I intended. You see, I'd never seen the poison work before. Tell Cersei. I want her to know it was me.'

characters.name: Stannis Baratheon
characters.roleInStory: Stannis Baratheon, the stern and determined king, seeks to claim the Iron Throne and restore his family's honor.

characters.name: Khal Drogo
characters.roleInStory: Khal Drogo, the fierce and powerful leader of the Dothraki, seeks to conquer and expand his empire.

characters.name: Melisandre of Asshai
characters.roleInStory: Melisandre of Asshai, the enigmatic and powerful priestess, seeks to fulfill her religious prophecies and serve the Lord of Light.

characters.name: The Stranger
characters.roleInStory: The Stranger, the enigmatic and mysterious god, is one of the seven gods of the Faith of the Seven.
placesVisited: The House of Black and White

characters.name: Varys
characters.roleInStory: Varys, the cunning and enigmatic spymaster, seeks to maintain power and influence through political maneuvering and manipulation. A eunuch and a member of the Small Council. A master of disguise, he along with Littlefinger are always aware of what goes on in Court.

characters.name: Robert Baratheon
characters.roleInStory: King of the Seven Kingdoms of Westeros and longtime friend of Ned Stark. Robert was engaged to Ned's sister, Lyanna, whose abduction by Prince Rhaegar Targaryen incited Robert's uprising against the throne. When Lyanna died during the war, Robert married Cersei Lannister.

characters.name: Renly Baratheon
characters.roleInStory: Renly Baratheon, the charismatic and ambitious king, seeks to claim the Iron Throne and restore his family's honor.
